Articles.Content:
There is a really old topic here 

that asks for the same but it seems it never went into development. 

Is there anything (mod, setting, etc) that can be done to have the same three buttons and functions for showing the centers-of-stuff inflight the same way they are displayed in the VAB/SPH?

How difficult would you guess would it be to develop a plugin that does that if no one wants to make it or has it? Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced/Impossible?

In before a bunch of people drop by to tell you how what you ask is utterly useless, can't be done, is not informative, would not work, cannot catch all edge cases, blah blah blah. The question has been asked a few times before, and that seems to be the result every time.

I wish I had time to spare on doing this myself, cause I'm tired of seeing people come in just to shoot the whole idea down before anyone with the time and ability gets fired up enough to give it a try. It honestly does not seem to me like it should be such an incredibly big deal, even if it can't be 100% physically accurate at all times (it's a game, after all).

Roundabout way of saying 'yah I'd like that too', but I'm not holding my breath any longer. Some day though, someone will prove 'em all wrong. Some day.
DO IT NOW DO IT NOW DO IT NOW DO IT NOW
This could be very educational...  I mean, it can't be harder to implement than what you can get through the alt-f12 menu.  Maybe a job for @ferram4?
